Elon Musk did in 19 days what others take 4 years to accomplish, and Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang explains how.

In just 19 days, Muskâ€™s team built a massive xAI factory from the ground up, complete with an advanced liquid-cooled infrastructure. This remarkable effort included deploying 100,000 GPUs, creating what is now the fastest supercomputer system on the planet.

A project of this scale would typically require 3 years of planning and 1 year of execution. Yet Elon Musk and his team delivered the entire system in under three weeks.
